column5: Love to hang with you Blyght. I would love a few walleye sessions with you too!  Cliff explained your nocturnal routine to me.  Actually, the same way in which you systematically cracked the walleye code applies to Pike (and I guess all fish!)  One day we'll meet and I'll be revealed as the hack/has-been that I really am.  Cheers!
Wow first post!  Thanks,  Now you'll have to give everyone an intro  Welcome aboard Billfish!

Nice fish there snag. Got out to the islands early this year just the one time with my youngest and just havent made the time to get back again. It's OK, I can live it through you guys who frequent the islands. Sorry to hear about your un-answered calls from DSN..... Your reports are freaking hilarious....keep it up! peter
Nice pike Snag!!!!
duuuuuude you're the TO pike non-slayer!  wicked post  uf
Huh? Unanswered calls? I didn't hear the phone ring. LOL
DSN is a stand up guy.  He has lent me lures and knowledge.  Again, he's a real diehard.  "When the student is ready, the master will appear"   See you when we most and least expect in DSN!
Congrats! A nice fat fish!

Went out to a spot that is a hit and miss kinda location. When they hit, they tend to be big.  It was beautiful. Warm, calm. (last night the forecast said 25-30km winds!?)  Not a soul in sight.   Noooobody  El' zippo humanoid count.  Except this OFC dude. That's DSN. I loathe him.  Gosh, look at all the fog that rolled in.  We were fishing on opposite sides of a bay when I felt a Bump and then a BANG  and then a KAZOWEE! A big ol' pike took in my deep diving Musky lure. And broke it!!!!   Here is the pic I always take in case I lose it!    And here is the pic that never does justice. (The pic could have been better if DSN wasn't such a wuss and swam over to help, but NOOOOOO. I'm holding a grudge against him now and I would ask that all of you spite him with me, together. Thanks.)  Nice and big and heavy. If you look close, there is a bubble/tumor on it's head. I'm hoping to catch it again with such a distinct mark. Again, no measurements (blame DSN) so I'll never know if it was a PB.  Note: I will keep posting the titles with PB in them because it really seems to work at sucking you in to have a look and gratifying my attention starved ego. I hope the view count hits 1000.  Thanks everyone! See ya Dennison. (watch your back)
fat pike!  Looks like a fun day!  Cheers!
oh wow! thats a beaut, oooohh man u did it now... i gottttaaaa get out there!!
Nice pike Snag, thanks for another great report.
Wow!!! Great fish!!!  Another great report Snag...with this weather, I'll be reading your reports well into February I think!
Awesome gator! Congrats  Cheers, 1leg
Very nice, Snag.  Glad to see that your previous war wounds haven't hurt your catch rate.  Nice pike, too.  WTG.
What a beauty!  Great and entertaining report as usual Snag.  Keep em coming, it makes my day  Joey

Yeah I knew it was ma ma when I saw the just the head come out of the water. I did shout over to you if you needed a hand but I heard no answer. Infact it was twice.   But I guess you were so happy you managed on your own. Next time!!  dsn
Nice beast mang!
Well done Snag.  With your current streak I'm sure a 20lber from shore is just around the corner.  Thanks for posting.
Good report. I recognise that light fixture, unfortunately they are all along the Boardwalk that follows the Lake O shoreline.
Hey folks I starting to think we will be taking our boats to Simcoe in January.Pike fishing Dec 14th no ice.Today in Montreal 12 degrees.  Always love the Pike report .Mike
Always fun seeing urban reports from you snag.  Mike
Great Fish man... wish the ones I catch would grow up to be like that one....
nice report,and cool pics of that nice pike way to go

Thanks man,  You're the only diehard that I've consistently met on the waterfront. That may have been the fish we saw on your wrist......................................   Well DSN located it, I think?  "Talk about your plenty, talk about your ills,  One man gathers, What another man spills!"  StStephen   Please stop giving away precise locations! Geez.    I would love to be a shipmate. Anytime Mike!  Thanks
Good lookin pike there Snag....
great looking pike man!!!!
Nice chunky Pike!!
what a piggy
That's a decent pike you got there
Nice fish, and great report!  dk
That's a big pike.  Nice report as usual Snag.  May be I should dust down my rods for one last try this year.  007
Thanks for the report and the laughs....very nice fish!  When you get tired of catching all those pike maybe you can teach me how you do it  lol  blyght
